Articles.Content:
Hello fellow space travellers,

I bought Kerbal a few weeks ago and I must say it is probably one of the best games I have played so far. I literally JUST finished my first mission to Mun and had my first Kerbals walk on there. Proudest moment I had in a game so far after many many failed attempts. Speaking of that. Could anyone tell me how to edit my signature? I really want some ribbons there.

Kind regards,

thoose
You won't be able to change your profile until you submit 4 more posts and the forum software agrees to believe that you are not a spambot. So get to yammering.
